/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding vibrancy to the urban landscape. Cars and trucks are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy traffic typical of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the colorful buildings. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting.
